# MPMusicPlaybackState.interrupted

**Case**

The music player has been interrupted, such as by an incoming phone call.

## Declaration

```swift
case interrupted
```

## Constants

- **MPMusicPlaybackState.stopped**: The music player is stopped.
- **MPMusicPlaybackState.playing**: The music player is playing.
- **MPMusicPlaybackState.paused**: The music player is paused.
- **MPMusicPlaybackState.seekingForward**: The music player is seeking forward.
- **MPMusicPlaybackState.seekingBackward**: The music player is seeking backward.

items.description: The music player is seeking forward.
items.name: MPMusicPlaybackState.seekingForward

items.description: The music player is seeking backward.
